title: O Crime do Padre Amaro
overview: Based on the romance of one of the most prestigious authors of Portuguese literature, Eça de Queiroz, the series follows the story of the forbidden passion between Amaro, a young priest, and Amélia "the most beautiful girl in town". Tense, emotional and anchored in personality conflicts, the series takes a critical look at society and the church in Portugal, in the 19th century.
